title: Refund Policy
intro: At NutriProfile, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. This refund policy explains your rights and the conditions for refunds.

guarantee.title: 1. Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.content: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all new Premium and Pro subscriptions. If you are not satisfied with our service for any reason, you can request a full refund within 14 days of your initial purchase.
guarantee.conditions: This guarantee applies only to the first subscription purchase. Renewals are not eligible for this guarantee.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility Conditions
eligibility.content: To be eligible for a refund, you must:

items.timeframe: Make your request within 14 days of purchase
items.firstPurchase: It must be your first subscription purchase
items.noAbuse: Not have previously abused the refund system
items.validAccount: Have a valid and active account

steps.provide: Provide your account email address and the reason for your request
steps.review: Our team will review your request within 2-3 business days
steps.refund: If approved, the refund will be processed within 5-10 business days

method.title: 4. Refund Method
method.content: Refunds are processed through Paddle, our payment processor. The refund will be credited to the original payment method used for the purchase.
method.note: The exact timing depends on your bank or credit card provider.

exceptions.title: 5. Exceptions
exceptions.content: Refunds will not be granted in the following cases:

items.afterPeriod: Requests made after the 14-day guarantee period
items.abuse: Repeated abuse of the service or refunds

cancellation.title: 6. Subscription Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
cancellation.note: Cancellation does not entitle you to a prorated refund for the remaining period.

prorated.title: 7. Prorated Refunds
prorated.content: Prorated refunds for unused periods are generally not offered. However, exceptions may be made in exceptional circumstances at our discretion.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding our refund policy or to make a refund request, please contact us at:

footer.paddle: Payments are securely processed by Paddle.com as Merchant of Record.
